Plots expression heatmaps

plotMetaDataHeatmap_vs.Rd

Plots expression heatmaps

plotMetaDataHeatmap_vs(
  gobject,
  expression_values = c("normalized", "scaled", "custom"),
  metadata_cols = NULL,
  selected_genes = NULL,
  first_meta_col = NULL,
  second_meta_col = NULL,
  show_values = c("zscores", "rescaled", "original", "zscores_rescaled"),
  custom_cluster_order = NULL,
  clus_cor_method = "pearson",
  clus_cluster_method = "complete",
  custom_gene_order = NULL,
  gene_cor_method = "pearson",
  gene_cluster_method = "complete",
  gradient_color = c("blue", "white", "red"),
  gradient_midpoint = 0.5,
  gradient_limits = NULL,
  x_text_size = 10,
  x_text_angle = 45,
  y_text_size = 10,
  strip_text_size = 8,
  show_plot = NA,
  return_plot = NA,
  save_plot = NA,
  save_param = list(),
  default_save_name = "plotMetaDataHeatmap"
)

Arguments

gobject

Giotto object
expression_values

one of normalized, scaled, custom
metadata_cols

mdata
selected_genes

genes to use
first_meta_col

1st meta col
second_meta_col

2nd meta col
show_values

one of zscores, rescaled, original, zscores_rescaled
custom_cluster_order

cell clustering order
clus_cor_method

cell correlation method
clus_cluster_method

cell clustering method
custom_gene_order

gene order
gene_cor_method

gene correlation method
gene_cluster_method

gene clustering method
gradient_color

grad colour
gradient_midpoint

grad midpoint
gradient_limits

gradlimits
x_text_size

x text size
x_text_angle

x text angle
y_text_size

y text size
strip_text_size

strip text size
show_plot

show plot
return_plot

return plot
save_plot

save plot
save_param

save parameters
default_save_name

default saving name

Value

Heatmap
